perturbation.original_text:
(a)
Exclusive Appointment
Ehave hereby appoints CHT, and CHT hereby accepts the appointment, to act as Ehave’s reseller of the use of the Ehave Companion
Solution within the Field of Use in the Territory for the duration of the Term solely in accordance with the terms and conditions of this
Agreement. Subject to Section 2(e), the foregoing appointment is exclusive such that Ehave shall not appoint any other Person to, nor may
Ehave itself, sell or resell the use of the Ehave Companion Solution within the Field of Use anywhere in the Territory.
perturbation.changed_text:
(a)
Exclusive Appointment
Ehave hereby appoints CHT, and CHT hereby accepts the appointment, to act as Ehave’s distributor of the use of the Ehave Companion
Solution within the Field of Use in the Territory for the duration of the Term solely in accordance with the terms and conditions of this
Agreement. Subject to Section 2(e), the foregoing appointment is exclusive such that Ehave shall not appoint any other Person to, nor may
Ehave itself, sell or resell the use of the Ehave Companion Solution within the Field of Use anywhere in the Territory.
perturbation.explanation: The term "reseller" is replaced with "distributor" without a clear definition of whether they are interchangeable. If CHT is a distributor and not a reseller, then what are the obligations of CHT?

perturbation.original_text:
(a)
Definitions
In this Agreement and the schedules annexed hereto, the following terms shall have the respective meanings indicated below:
“Acceptance Criteria” has the meaning ascribed to it in Section 3(d).
“Acceptance Period” has the meaning ascribed to it in Section 3(d).
“Acceptance Procedures” has the meaning ascribed to it in Section 3(d).
“Agreement” means this license and reseller agreement and all Schedules, Appendixes and Exhibits attached hereto.
“Applicable Laws” means any and all (i) laws, statutes, rules, regulations, by laws, codes, treaties, constitutions and ordinances, including
Privacy Legislation (“Laws”), (ii) order, directive, judgment, decree, award or writ of any court (including a court of equity), arbitrator or
arbitration panel, or any Governmental Authority or other body exercising adjudicative, regulatory, judicial or quasi-judicial powers,
including any stock exchange (“Orders”), and (iii) policies, guidelines, standards, requirements, notices and protocols of any
Governmental Authority (“Policies”); which are applicable to or govern CHT, Ehave or the transactions contemplated by this Agreement.
Source: EHAVE, INC., 20-F, 5/15/2019
perturbation.changed_text:
(a)
Definitions
In this Agreement and the schedules annexed hereto, the following terms shall have the respective meanings indicated below:
“Acceptance Criteria” has the meaning ascribed to it in Section 3(d).
“Acceptance Period” has the meaning ascribed to it in Section 3(d).
“Acceptance Procedures” has the meaning ascribed to it in Section 3(d).
“Agreement” means this license and reseller agreement and all Schedules, Appendixes and Exhibits attached hereto.
“Applicable Laws” means any and all (i) laws, statutes, rules, regulations, by laws, codes, treaties, constitutions and ordinances, including
Privacy Legislation (“Regulations”), (ii) order, directive, judgment, decree, award or writ of any court (including a court of equity), arbitrator or
arbitration panel, or any Governmental Authority or other body exercising adjudicative, regulatory, judicial or quasi-judicial powers,
including any stock exchange (“Orders”), and (iii) policies, guidelines, standards, requirements, notices and protocols of any
Governmental Authority (“Policies”); which are applicable to or govern CHT, Ehave or the transactions contemplated by this Agreement.
Source: EHAVE, INC., 20-F, 5/15/2019
perturbation.explanation: In the definition of Applicable Laws, 'Laws' is replaced with 'Regulations' which could have a different definition than the actual applicable laws in this section. This causes confusion of which one to follow in the whole contract.

perturbation.original_text:
(b)
Provision to End Users
CHT shall require each End User to enter into and execute a subscription agreement in a form and substance satisfactory to Ehave and
CHT, acting reasonably, and which contains provisions similar to Ehave’s collaboration agreement for the use of the Ehave solution (the
“Subscription Agreement”). Ehave shall be a third party beneficiary hereunder, but shall not have any obligations to the End User
thereunder.
perturbation.changed_text:
(b)
Provision to End Users
CHT shall require each End User to enter into and execute a licensing agreement in a form and substance satisfactory to Ehave and
CHT, acting reasonably, and which contains provisions similar to Ehave’s collaboration agreement for the use of the Ehave solution (the
“Subscription Agreement”). Ehave shall be a third party beneficiary hereunder, but shall not have any obligations to the End User
thereunder.
perturbation.explanation: Changing "subscription agreement" to "licensing agreement" creates an internal contradiction, as the defined term "Subscription Agreement" is still used in the paragraph. This can lead to confusion about which type of agreement is actually required.
